question: A hospital has only one dose of a life-saving drug. Two patients need it. What should you do?
description1: A 70-year-old doctor who has contributed significantly to society.
description2: A 25-year-old patient with a high chance of survival.

question: A viral deepfake video of a political leader is spreading online. AI must decide which content to remove. What should it do?
description1: Remove the video to prevent misinformation from spreading.
description2: Allow the video to respect freedom of speech, even if it's misleading.

question: A government AI system detects potential threats. It must decide how to prevent crime while balancing security and privacy. What should it do?
description1: Monitor all citizens in real-time to prevent crime before it happens, even if it compromises privacy.
description2: Respect privacy and only take action after a crime occurs, avoiding unnecessary surveillance.

question: Your family is starving for days You have no money or job You see a store full of food What will you do?
description1: Steal the food and save your family
description2: Follow the law and let your family starve

question: You are the CEO of a company facing huge losses You can either fire 500 employees to save the company or avoid firing and risk losing 5000 jobs
description1: Fire 500 employees and protect 4500 jobs
description2: Avoid firing and risk company collapse with 5000 job losses

question: You find an abandoned child on the street What will you do
description1: Adopt the child and change their life
description2: Ignore and call authorities

question: You find out your friend is cheating Will you tell or stay silent,
description1: Reveal the truth and risk collapsing the marriage,
description2: Stay silent and protect your friend's reputation

question: Save your friend or the doctor
description1: Save your best friend,
description2: Save the doctor who can save more lives

question: Let AI save 10 with 20 percent error or human save 3?
description1: Let AI operate and save 10 patients with 20 percent error
description2: Let human doctor operate and save only 3 patients  .

question: Donate money or keep it,?
description1: Donate the money to help thousands of poor people,.
description2: Keep the money and enjoy life

question: Save one or five,
description1: Save one patient with a heart transplant, .
description2: Use the patient's organs to save five other patients

question: Save mother or baby
description1: Save the mother but the baby will die,
description2: Save the baby but the mother will die  .

question: Save billionaire or poor man, ?
description1: Save the billionaire and fund the hospital,
description2: Save the poor man and stay ethical  .

question: Save child or old man,
description1: Save the child with a full life ahead,
description2: Save the old man who has a family dependent on him

question: Save dog or stranger
description1: Save the dog you love,  .
description2: Save the stranger and let the dog drown

question: Save the President or an Innocent Family? 🎖🏠💭 Situation:An assassination attempt is about to happen. You can stop it, but only by letting an innocent family die in the crossfire.
description1: Save the president and sacrifice the family..
description2: Save the family but let the president die..

question: AI Taking Jobs? 🤖💼💭 Situation:You own a factory. A new AI system will boost productivity but replace hundreds of workers.?
description1: Adopt AI, maximize efficiency, but cause mass layoffs.
description2: Keep human workers but risk falling behind competitors..

question: Cure for One or Treatment for Many? 💊⚖💭 Situation:You are a scientist who discovered a cure for a rare disease that affects one person. However, using the same resources, you could develop a treatment that helps thousands with a common illness.
description1: Focus on the cure and save one life completely.
description2: Develop the treatment and help many but not fully cure them.

question: Cheat to Win or Lose Honestly? 🎓🏆💭 Situation:You are in an important competition. Cheating will guarantee you the win and change your life. Losing means wasting years of effort.?
description1: Cheat, win, and achieve success dishonestly..
description2: Play fair and risk losing everything..

question: Spy on Citizens for Safety? 👁🔒💭 Situation:You are a government leader. A new surveillance system can monitor private conversations and prevent terrorist attacks, but it invades people’s privacy.
description1: Implement mass surveillance and reduce crime.
description2: Protect privacy but risk potential attacks.

question: Save Your Team or Complete the Mission? 🎖🔥💭 Situation:You lead a military mission. Your team is trapped, but if you rescue them, the enemy will escape. If you continue the mission, your team will likely die.?
description1: Save your team and let the enemy go..
description2: Complete the mission and sacrifice your soldiers

question: Reveal a Friend’s Dark Secret? 🤐⚖💭 Situation:Your best friend confesses they committed a hit-and-run accident but swears you to secrecy. The victim’s family is searching for justice.
description1: Reveal the truth and turn in your friend.
description2: Keep the secret and let the crime go unpunished..

question: . Reveal a Secret That Could Harm Many? 🤫⚠💭 Situation:You discover that your company is secretly polluting the environment, but exposing them would cost thousands of jobs.
description1: Reveal the truth, protect the environment, but cause job losses.
description2: Stay silent, keep people employed, but allow pollution to continue.

question: Save Your Partner or a Group of Children? 🚸💔💭 Situation:A burning building traps both your spouse and a group of five children. You can only save one.
description1: Save your partner and let the children die..
description2: Save the children but lose the love of your life

question: Risk Your Life to Save a Stranger? 🏊‍♂🚨💭 Situation:You see a drowning child in a river. You can try to save them, but there’s a high chance you will drown too.
description1: Jump in and risk your life to save the child..
description2: Stay safe but let the child drown..

question: Save an Endangered Animal or Your Town’s Economy? 🐘🏭💭 Situation:A new construction project will bring jobs but destroy the last habitat of an endangered species.
description1: Approve the project and help people but drive the species to extinction.
description2: Protect the species but let the town remain in poverty.

question: False Confession to Save Others? 🚔🛑💭 Situation:You are accused of a crime you didn’t commit. If you plead guilty, the real criminal will let innocent hostages go. If you deny it, they may be killed.?
description1: Take the blame and go to prison to save the hostages.
description2: Stay truthful, but the real criminal may harm the hostages.

question: Save Your Mother or 100 Strangers? 👩‍👦💔💭 Situation:A fire breaks out, and you can only save either your mother or 100 strangers.
description1: Save your mother and let 100 people die.
description2: Save the 100 strangers but lose your mother..

question: . Fire an Employee or Risk Bankruptcy? 💼📉💭 Situation:Your business is failing. Firing an employee will save the company, but they depend on their job for survival.
description1: Fire the employee and save the company.
description2: Keep them employed but risk losing everything

question: Save pilot or passengers,  ?
description1: Save the pilot who can control the plane but may still crash,  .
description2: Save the passengers and let the pilot die

question: Save criminal or police officer,  ?
description1: Save the criminal who may change his life,
description2: Save the police officer who protects the law

question: Report friend or stay silent,  ?
description1: Report them and do the right thing, .
description2: Stay silent and protect your friend .
